alert.note: Alert for Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 26 at 4:40PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Pueblo County through 515 PM MDT... At 440 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Pueblo West, or near Pueblo. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pueblo, Pueblo West, Pueblo Reservoir, Salt Creek and Blende. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet
